VIII.ii.1.C.1.f
.
Considering VHA Persian Gulf Health Registry Examinations
In all cases when the Veteran has been examined as part of the Veterans Heath Administration (VHA) Persian Gulf Health Registry, ensure those results have been obtained and considered when rating the Gulf War-related issues.
Reference
:Â  For more information on developing for the Gulf War Registry examination, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart ii, 1.B.1.f
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section C - Rating Presumptive Service Connection (SC) Claims for Persian Gulf Veterans
citation: Part VIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section C
